name: 0cord - Pitch black discord
description: A pitch black theme for discord, works as of 2020-01-09 on stable.
additional_info:
2020-01-09 update:
A lot of stuff fixed.
See commit history: https://gitlab.com/a/0cord/commits/rewrite

2019-10-09 update:
A lot of stuff fixed.
See commit history: https://gitlab.com/a/0cord/commits/rewrite

2019-04-28 update:
A lot of stuff fixed.
See commit history: https://gitlab.com/a/0cord/commits/rewrite

2019-01-21 update:
- ANNOUNCEMENT: You can now use 0cord directly on your Android Phone! Check out https://gitlab.com/a/0cord#use-0cord-on-your-phone
- COMPLETE REWRITE: I rewrote the whole thing, and am now using selectors! Things are less likely to break now.
- FIX: Various broken things were fixed, new things were added to the list of corrected colors.
- ADDITION: Links, mentions and channel names now have custom colors.

2018-12-10 update:
- Improvement: most colors are now set in variables, allowing for further customization and further consistency
- Improvement: most selectors were moved to more future proof alternatives
- Improvement: various colors were set to a more consistent version, most notably the emoji picker
- Improvement: Hover on channel names is now improved significantly, making it look and function better
- Optional improvement: Many colors were added for optional configuration, such as message color, channel name/topic color, guild name color, timestamp color etc
- Fixed: color and shape of guild icon hover tooltip
- Fixed: x new messages since y bar
- Fixed: protip on empty pins menu
- Fixed: QS selections/hovers
- Fixed: search bar when doing searches
- Fixed: Billing tab
- Fixed: Nitro banner in Nitro tab
- Fixed: Hover on quick invite
- Fixed: "no game detected" in Game Activity tab
- Fixed: hover on friends on "Add friends to DM"
- Fixed: color persist when not hovered but with popup on online list
- Fixed: server members hover
- Fixed: message right click
- Fixed: Search popup
- Fixed: Emoji autocomplete
- Removed: Social links on settings

2018-12-08 update:
- Removed gif button (fuck discord)
- Fixed scrollbar on diversity selector
- Fixed a couple gray pixels here and there
- Fixed hover on settings dropdown
- Fixed "an adventure begins", untested
- Fixed hover on buttons and friends on friend screens
- Fixed call screen
- Fixed keyboard combos modal

2018-08-29 update:
- Properly darkened clyde messages
- Dark message embed on message delete popup thingy
- Dark dimmer and popout background on diversity selector of emoji picker

2018-08-26 update:
- Dark emoji picker
- Dark image upload modal
- Dark role add popout
- Dark in voice notice/bar
